name: Don't Quit When It's Hard
description: Don' Quit When It's Hard is a self-contemplation from David Wirawan P when he took his first acid. This graphic artwork was created because that the thoughts of quitting and just walking away show up in everyone's mind every time things get hard and it's normal. But, life isn't mean to be easy, and if it is, then you are doing it wrong. Just hang on, everything will be wonderful at the end.
